'''''"Battlegoat" and "Ironclaw"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series III]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend|Local Legends]] {{Enemy|Cacaua Goat|text="Battlegoat" &mdash; Brute Knight of the Iron Hills}} and {{Enemy|Flowfire Bird|text="Ironclaw" &mdash; Apex Bird of the Iron Hills}} at the same time by having Battlegoat collide with Ironclaw's guard stance.
